articles.description: Follow live radio & text commentary plus score updates as Leicester host Arsenal plus six other Premier League fixtures, including Man City v Newcastle.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Leicester v Arsenal, Man City v Newcastle plus more - radio, text & score updates

articles.description: Omar Marmoush introduces himself as Manchester City's own Egyptian king with a superb 14-minute first-half hat-trick against Newcastle to send Pep Guardiola's side fourth in the Premier League.
articles.title: Manchester City 4-0 Newcastle United: Omar Marmoush hits hat-trick in thumping win

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text updates of Saturday's Scottish football, including four Premiership games.
articles.title: Four Premiership games headline Saturday's Scottish football - radio & text: BBC Sport

articles.description: Mikel Merino makes his case to be Arsenal's striker solution after his match-winning heroics in the vital win at Leicester City, says BBC Sport Chief Football Writer Phil McNulty
articles.title: Can Mikel Merino be the solution to Arsenal striker crisis?

articles.description: World number one Jannik Sinner accepts to a three-month ban from tennis after reaching a settlement with the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) over his two positive drugs test last year.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: Italian banned for three months for doping

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Aston Villa vs Ipswich Town in the Premier League
articles.title: Aston Villa vs Ipswich Town: Premier League preview, team news, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Follow live text coverage from 10 games in the Championship starting with Preston v Burnley, Cardiff v Bristol City and Oxford v Portsmouth.
articles.title: Championship LIVE: 10 games starting with three at 12:30 GMT

articles.description: England opener Ben Duckett is passed fit to take part in the Champions Trophy after a scan on a groin problem.
articles.title: ICC Champions Trophy: Ben Duckett passed fit for England after groin problem

articles.description: A thumping 3-0 loss and no shots on target - how, after more than £1.5bn spent, have Chelsea ended up with no centre-forward?
articles.title: Brighton 3-0 Chelsea: How did Chelsea end up with no fit strikers?

articles.description: The Premier League's rules governing sponsorship deals from the period between between 2021 and 2024 are "void and unenforceable", a tribunal rules.
articles.title: Premier League sponsorship rules 'void' says tribunal
